```{r setup, include=FALSE}

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(huxtable)
library(gtsummary)
library(labelled)

data(penguins)

penguins <- penguins %>%
  bstfun::use_varnames_as_labels()

theme_gtsummary_compact()

```

# Regular Table

```{r}
df <- penguins %>% head(n =10)

df %>% huxtable()


```



# {gtsummary} Examples

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels() %>%
  as_hux_table()
```


# With Compact Theme

```{r}
theme_gtsummary_compact()

penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels() %>%
  as_hux_table()

reset_gtsummary_theme()
```

# Add Header

```{r}
penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels()  %>%
  as_hux_table() %>%
  set_caption("Title") 

```

# Highlight Specific Values

```{r}
x <- penguins %>% 
  tbl_summary() %>%
  bold_labels() %>%
  italicize_levels()  %>%
  as_hux_table() %>%
  set_caption("Title") 
```


```{r}
x %>%
  set_text_color(3, 2, "purple")
```



```{r}
x %>%
  mutate(new_cond = parse_number(stat_0)) %>%
  set_text_color(row = .$new_cond >= 100, 2,  "purple") %>%
  select(-new_cond)
```

# Spanning Headers

```{r}

sum <- penguins %>%
  select(species, island, sex) %>%
  tbl_summary(by = species) %>%
  add_p()

sum2 <- penguins %>%
  select(species, island, sex) %>%
  tbl_summary(by = species) %>%
  add_p()


reg <- glm(species ~ island + sex, family = binomial(), data = penguins)

reg <- reg %>%
  tbl_regression()

tbl_merge(list(sum, reg),
          tab_spanner = c("**Summary Statistics**", "**Regression**")) %>% 
  as_hux_table() %>%
  set_all_borders()




```
